availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Pascal Wannall (Washington D.C. Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Maryland natice. Married to Mary Miles Wannall on August 1, 1835. Married to Mary Hollingshead Wannall. Father of Lizzie M. Wannall. Clerk for the United States Treasury Department in 1860. Justice of the peace for Washington, District of Columbia in 1864. Candidate for a seat on the Common Council of Washington, District of Columbia in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, District of Columbia, Washington, Ward 3, p. 83; Evening Star (Washington, D.C.), May 30, 1865, p. 4; Marriage Records. District of Columbia Marriages. FamilySearch, Salt Lake City, UT., Film# 002079251; Find A Grave, "Charles Pascal Wannall (1808-1893)," Memorial #44846764, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=44846764&ref=acom (accessed March 29, 2017).
